title: Modern Luxury Apartment for sale in Talawatugoda: Hokandara
details:
3 bedroom unfurnished apartment conveniently located in Hokandara area (Wanaguru Mawatha) surrounded by lush scenic greenery. Just two minutes away from Athurugiriya express entrance & easy access to Colombo via Talawatugoda. Apartment is under the management of Home Lands Skyline. There are several modifications has done by owner to make this unit more luxury & elegant.
This ground floor apartment unit has the added advantage of having a backyard.


Apartment (1202 sqft) comprises of:
• Master bedroom & attached bathroom
• 2 Bedrooms & common bathroom
• Living & dining area
• Magnificent Mahogani closet (Customized)
• Kitchen with customized Teak pantry, 4 burner cooker & cooker hood (all granite tops)
• Maid’s area & toilet
• Premium bathware & kitchen fittings
• Customized LED lighting system
• Hot water system
• Covered parking area

Common facilities:
• Swimming pool & well equipped gym
• Spacious front area
• 24/7 security with CCTV cameras
& much more.


Strictly No brokers
Call us to view the apartment (Seen by appointment only).
